title: WB Event Log Web Component
description: Schema for wb-event-log custom element attributes

max-events.description: Maximum number of events to store

auto-scroll.description: Whether to automatically scroll to new events

show-timestamps.description: Whether to display timestamps for events

show-source.description: Whether to display event source information

expandable-details.description: Whether events can be expanded to show details

claude-save-enabled.description: Whether to show the Save to Claude.md button

claude-auto-group.description: Whether to group events by type when saving to claude.md

compact.description: Whether to use compact display mode

truncate-length.description: Length at which to truncate long messages

wrap-mode.description: How to handle long text content

default-filters.description: JSON string containing array of default enabled filters

event-types.description: JSON string containing custom event type definitions

virtual-scrolling.description: Whether to use virtual scrolling for performance

id.description: Unique identifier for the event log

name.description: Name attribute for the event log

onevent-added.description: JavaScript code to execute when an event is added

onevent-filtered.description: JavaScript code to execute when events are filtered

onevent-cleared.description: JavaScript code to execute when events are cleared

onexport.description: JavaScript code to execute when events are exported

onwb-event-log:event-added.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-event-log:event-added event

onwb-event-log:filtered.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-event-log:filtered event

onwb-event-log:cleared.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-event-log:cleared event

onwb-event-log:exported.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-event-log:exported event

aria-labelledby.description: ID of element that labels this event log

aria-describedby.description: ID of element that describes this event log

aria-live.description: How screen readers announce new events

role.description: ARIA role for the event log
